title: The Contenders (Round 2)
itunes:title: The Contenders (Round 2)
description: Every year since 1992 Two Guys Smoke Shop has been announcing the prestigious Cigar of the Year award, but it all starts with "The Contenders;" 7 of the hottest and best cigars in the industry. Last week we revealed the first 3 of the 2011 Contenders, and on today's Cigar Authority we reveal and light up the remaining 7 nominees. What are the final 7 contenders for 2011 Cigar of the Year, and how can you help decide the ultimate winner? Tune in to find out!
